meanings: (옷을) (동작) put on, dress, get dressed; (걸치다) slip on; (급히) throw on; (상태) wear, have (sth) on, be dressed in
(도움·은혜 등을) be indebted to, get[receive] a favor, be favored (with)

vlive.korean: 눈, 코, 입 다 있구먼 - 알겠어 인마 - 우리 민규는? You have eyes, a nose and a mouth. - Okay, fine. - Then, MINGYU? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]SEVENTEEN X LieV - 세븐틴의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: You have eyes, a nose and a mouth. - Okay, fine. - Then, MINGYU?

vlive.korean: [최혜자(5n) / 엄마 오늘 입 다 풀고 간다] 만약 그렇게 됐으면 네가 안 생겼지. [Choi Hyeja (5n) / Mom is laying it all out today] If that was the case, you wouldn't be here. 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : <쎈마이웨이> 여자가 먼저 고백해도 되나요?
vlive.english: [Choi Hyeja (5n) / Mom is laying it all out today] If that was the case, you wouldn't be here.

vlive.korean: 입 다 보여요. We see the mouth. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] ASTRO X Rooftop Live - 아스트로의 루프탑라이브!
입 다 틀려. Your lip syncing is so off. 듣기 View video ASTRO : 별둥이 깜짝 브이앱☆
vlive.english: Your lip syncing is so off.

vlive.english: I like eyes, nose, and lips.

examples.korean: to suffer multiple injuries 발음듣기 복합 부상을 입다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
to slip into/out of a dress 발음듣기 드레스를 재빨리 입다/벗다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.english: to sustain damage/an injury/a defeat 발음
